rows.label: tev012402_MSG0001
rows.name:
Oh, hello. You must be the "new friend" that
Colonel Elma mentioned in her report.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012402_MSG0002
rows.name:
Having just woken up after all that time, I'm sure
you're dying to get home and take a shower.
Unfortunately, the west gate is closed at the moment.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012402_MSG0003
rows.name:
If you want to enter the city, you'll need to use the
elevator at the top of the stairs.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012402_MSG0004
rows.name:
They'll probably open the gate soon, thanks to the
great work you guys did killing the monsters that
were causing all that trouble.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev012402_MSG0005
rows.name:
But until then, you'll have to forgive the inconvenience.
Please understand![ST:wait ]
